Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • Book
  • class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that maintains information on a book. This might form part of a larger application such as a library system, for instance.
    Version:
    September 19, 2020
    Author:
    Karen Stagg

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Book​(java.lang.String bookAuthor, java.lang.String bookTitle, int bookPages)
      Set the author,title and pages fields when this object is constructed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getAuthor()
      Provide access to the string holding the author's name
      int getPages()
      Provide access to the int holding the book's pages
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Provide access to the string holding the book's title
      void printAuthor()
      Print the author name
      void printDetails()
      Print a formatted output of the book's details
      void printTitle()
      Print the book title
